name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a results-driven Product Engineer with 8 years of full stack development experience, I excel in utilizing **Python** and **Django** to create high-performance solutions, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. My proficiency with **AWS**, along with modern frameworks like **Vue.js**, allows me to build scalable applications aligned with business requirements. I have hands-on experience in integrating AI tools for enhanced functionality, ensuring intuitive **UX/UI design** to improve user engagement.

My strong foundation in Agile methodology fosters effective collaboration and problem-solving within cross-functional teams, while my empathetic communication style ensures alignment with stakeholders. Additionally, I have developed autonomous systems and enhanced existing platforms, demonstrating my commitment to delivering robust solutions that meet stringent compliance standards.
